name: Vivara Bali Private Pool Villas & Spa Retreat
address: Jl. Karang Mas, Jimbaran, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1:
The villas and the staff were all exceptional, no complaints with our rooms or the front office service at all.

Breakfast is a bit lacklustre in terms of options. We paid for 2 facials which were very expensive in comparison to other places we could‚Äôve gone down the road but we wanted to support the villa and assumed with such high quality service the facial would be too.
We were moisturised 4 times and each time they would wet some tissue (I could hear the tissue leaving the tissue box) and wipe our faces down and then put a mask on us and left us alone for 30 minutes. I could‚Äôve done this in my villa myself. Expected more of a facial massage or even massaging elsewhere while we had our face mask on. But they applied the mask, left the room for 30 minutes, came back took it off and that was it.

Pure waste of money.
review 2:
This resort is so nice, everything is done for the confort of the clients. We went there in december for our honeymoon and we could not be happier. The restaurant was so good and the staff incredibly nice.
The villa was soo beautiful and they made it so welcoming with the fruits the drinks and honeymoon spelled with rocks. It was magical ! Strongly recommend the SPA ! The couples massage was divine.
The pool is huge !
review 3:
I'm so disheartened that our families Bali vacation got ruined by this facility!we arrived on dates books, request an extra bed and said that we was traveling with kids the lady I spoke to over the phones was all of a sudden no longer working there but I spoke to her 6days prior, the staff treated us like terrorists , everything we request was an issue.my kids got sick on the second day I called front desk at 2am no one answered I called for several hours no answer(all I wanted was ice to cool temperature since we all stuck in one bed) I paid over $500 for a disgrace of a place! The breakfast was the worst ever, honestly this is not worth it! The manager came on our hour  being there wanting us to remove our reviews like where were you the entire time we was treated like thief's? We paid hard earned money to get a mess of a vacation!
I'm honestly disgusted by this treatment!
The worst part was when she said we take the money out of the staff salary for things (are you kidding me)
The fact that we had to get massages/lunch /dinner and activities at other facilities says a lot!
review 4: The villa was very nice and with great service, a fantastic layout and large pool. The breakfast was a bit disappointing, please change the orange juice, it is awfull.... And Bali ist know for the best coffee around the world... Serving coffee from a large international brand makes me cry....
review 5:
First of all place is cute , it has a lot of potential. The front staff was the worst and Al our stay sour the first night we were ready to pack our bags and go somewhere else but they wouldn't refund us.
We had a few request before arrival and none of them were met, we were given lies and excuses.my kids were forced to sleep on a sofa, the extra bed requested wasn't given and they wanted us to pay extra. Towels were dirty and full of stains daily!
Breakfast was unappealing  daily more like dinner.
I have nothing good to say but a beautiful place that has potential.

name: Argya Santi Resort Jimbaran
address: Jl. Jepun No.1, Jimbaran, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1:
Whatever you do do NOT book this hotel. Not only did I get bitten by bed bugs, which was confirmed by a medical professional. I also when I informed the hotel did absolutely nothing. They didn‚Äôt offer me a refund, or offer to take my clothes for professional cleaning. As you know ignoring bed bugs puts all guests at risk because their ability to travel. The women are sweet at reception but unable to deal with issues, when I called the manager he said ‚Äúsorry, it is my day off‚Äù. The incompetence and inability to accept responsibility was mind boggling.

Plus the rooms are not cleaned well, I had to change too d twice for ants on my bed as well, as captured. It‚Äôs not cleaned well. I normally hate leaving bad reviews but this one was very necessary. I don‚Äôt want any travelers experiencing what I did today.
review 2:
It‚Äôs a great value for money, the breakfast is definitely the highlight of our stay! However there were quite a few downsides.. On my first night i got bit by mosquitoes or some kind of other bugs, while eating outside it was more bugs than i ever experienced in Indonesia.. the AC kept making really loud noises out of nowhere, so i didn‚Äôt really get much sleep.. The road to the hotel is terrible but for a shorter stay it didn‚Äôt bother us too much.

To finish on a positive note, the staff is adorable, rooms have everything you need but the bug situation should be managed as well as broken AC‚Äôs..
review 3:
Good hotel!

It has a pool and a bar area. The rooms are good with clean showers and good space. The hotel is however a bit central with a 15 minute drive to most of the tourist attractions. They do supply motorbike rental with a good price of 90000 rupiah per 24 hours!
review 4:
This is a pretty good ‚Äúvalue for money‚Äù hotel. Just don‚Äôt be surprised by the terrible road which leads to it! The road is a nightmare to navigate with lots of pot holes and sharp rocks, along the road are heaps of stray dogs- do not recommend walking it.

The good parts:
- excellent buffet breakfast
- swimming pool
- friendly staff

Needs improvement:
- no hand soap provided in guest rooms ü§¶‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è
- bath towels provided but stained and washed out, not nice to use
- spa and massage is advertised as a service but was not available at the time
review 5: The hotel it‚Äôs beautiful, have a really nice swimming pool. The breakfast is good . The staff  is really nice . Every morning the housekeeping staff clean the room amazing. The shower is really good .

name: Abi Bali Resort Villas & Spa
address: Jl. Karang Mas Sejahtera No.89, Jimbaran, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1: I am really don't understand people who writing a bad review! This is my 5 time when I stopped in this place! Not so many people, especially after rainy season,  far away from the road and village,  quite place.  Personal polite and hospitality on main place.  Hotel not new, but everything is working.  Maybe, my friends, need to have more positive thoughts in your heads? Because it is good , especially during vacation!  Thanks for all workers this hotel! Next time I will back!
review 2:
Very bad
Normally we dont care if the hotel is a bit old, but this was the limit.. sooo hot in the room because the aircondition did not work fully!
when we told the lady in the reception that the aircondition did not work, and if they maybe had a fan, she just answered ‚Äúit is very hot in Bali right now‚Äù and we know because we have been in Bali for a month, but it has not been a problem anywhere else only this hotel
The location is bad because the road is scary to walk, very busy and no sidewalk
The female receptionist was so rude and childish
Would not waste the time to go there, lucky and happy that we only booked 2 nights
Also a lot of russians stay here
review 3: Very good location, even better facilities and on top of all very affordable prices. The staff was very helpful as well. Clean everyone. Yes, you can tell the hotel is a bit old but that ok compared to what you are paying. I‚Äôll definitely come back to stay here longer.
review 4:
Stayed here when we were on our honeymoon and what an incredible experience we had. A serene environment, impeccable service and privacy that we wanted.
They have a decent restaurant within their property and provided airport pickup and dropoff. The pool and entire outdoor setup is great to enjoy and so is the open shower. For the weather that we had in February, it provided a great escape!
review 5: AVOID This Hotel. DO NOT stay here, the road outside Extremely Dangerous. Lots of robbers outside the hotel. Easy to lose phones or motorbikes!

name: Jimbaran HUB
address: Jl. Karang Mas, Jimbaran, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1: really a very clean, spacious place and the service is really very good. There are many meeting rooms with various sizes, there are also several places to play and there are also cafes with very affordable prices. The road to the location is very adequate and easy to find üèª üèªüòçüòç
review 2: Yesterday we held an event here during Kartini, what we highlight the most here is VERY GOOD AND FRIENDLY SERVICE, always helping with whatever we want, apart from that, the place is very clean, spacious and quite completeüòçüòçüòç happy to have held an event here, place This is highly recommendedüòç
review 3: Amazing place for renting an working desk, conduct indoor or outdoor event... Facilities is more than good wifi. Nice food. Friendly professional staff, Yoga classes available in the morning and evening...... check up yourself.....
review 4: This place will entertaint you with many activities from eating and brewery experiences untill outdoor actovities including yoga, capoeira, karate, gokart, pilates, kids club, skating and many other fun activities. It's a place to really enjoying life in natural way. There is a gallery too that has occasional exibition event that represent many artist from painter to sculpturer. Good place that well built with natural design that contemplate the surrounding. Such a lovely and confortable place indeed.
review 5: has a spacious area and great place to recharge energy after a hectic dayü´∂üèº

name: Colabo Cafe
address: Jimbaran Hub, Jl. Karang Mas, Jimbaran, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1: Tasty food, delicoius dessert, nice stuff, good ambience. Recommend
review 2: Great place to get coffee and relax. They offer a variety of food as well.
review 3:
We were recommended by our hotel staff but were really disappointed by our experience here, especially as it was our first meal since arriving. Upon arrival, the man at the desk was sleeping face down at the till.
Someone else came and sat us down, but he didn‚Äôt look like he wanted to be there. No warmth in the greeting. Ordered Nasi Goreng and Barramundi. No one was at the restaurant but food took a while to arrive‚Ä¶ >20min. Nasi goreng came out by itself - looked ok but lacking love. Tasted ok except chicken satays were stone cold! Made me feel a bit nervous getting sick on first day so put to the side. My wife‚Äôs meal didn‚Äôt arrive for another 15min‚Ä¶ we were hoping for the best but unfortunately the barramundi was inedible. After pulling it apart, the flesh was all sticky, either not cooked or super old. Handed it back to them, paid for one meal and left.
Had amazing meals at all other warungs since!
Maybe we caught the staff on a bad day looking at the reviews‚Ä¶ maybe they all had a bender on the Friday night prior!?
review 4: very cozy place, inexpensive and tasty food, I recommend it to everyone.
review 5: It's the best place I've ever eaten at!

name: Villa Viking
address: No. 1 Blok E 6, Jl. Jepun, Jimbaran, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1: it was amazing experience to stay with them, they are very nice and friendly. they are serving a wonderful break fast in this affordable price range, all the major tourist area in Kuta are very near from this place. I will highly recommended this place to everyone who plan to come to Bali.
review 2:
Stayed here for 3 nights , really nice place , A lot of positives and a few Negatives.

All in all we would give this place a Firm 8/10. Thanks for having us üòä ‚ù§Ô∏è

Positive:
Good Location
Good rooms.
Clean.
Nice shared Kitchen.
Free Tea / Coffee / Water and honey üçØ

Negative:
‚úÖ Scooter üõµ area is very congested.
‚úÖ A lot of mosquitoes ü¶ü in and around this Villa. It is Bali after all.
‚úÖ Kitchen inside house a little messy as 1 cleaner who works very hard!
review 3:
Hotel owner stepped uninvited into my room shouting at me that I can't expect a good cleaning when I only pay 15$ per night. This happened after I wrote a neutral WhatsApp that it was not cleaned the last time.
Cleaning is only once per week, and they forget half. For guests who booked over platforms, they maybe clean every day, but not for guests who pay directly (and due to less commission funnily pay more, but get a much worse service).
It is next to a main road where loud motorbikes drive at night.
Very small place, so no privacy. I overhead the owner talking bad about me to new guests.
The video was taken after the owner shouted at me that I'm wrong saying it was not cleaned and he personally saw that it was definitely cleaned.
Unbelievable experience.
review 4: Fantastic place, lovely staff and the breakfast was good too. Stayed for 2 days. Rooms clean, small pool, serene and calm area.
review 5:
Amazing place with great people and great breakfast! The staff and the owners are very friendly and very nice.
We stayed for a month and it was fantastic ü´∂üèº

name: Muaya Villa
address: Jl. Jepun No.1 Blok C, Jimbaran, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1:
We booked it for our last two days before flying back to have a cozy and relaxing place to spend the time. I stayed in several places all over Bali and all were in a green setting but this felt like a prison to me so ultimately we changed our plans and fled the room to spend our last day. I'd recommend to spend a bit more and get something nicer.

The doors between rooms have had better times, couldn't be closed properly so insects and heat would get in. Things provided were basic, no soap bar (but soap dispenser in the shower), no separate towels for drying hands or using plunge pool.

Second day they asked if they should clean and we told yes. Didn't seem like they had done anything, not even new toilet paper was provided (we had to go to reception to get it).
review 2: This place is beautiful, i miss it already, i checked in on the 15th jan night, the owner is very friendly and accommodating, we were supposed to arrive in the afternoon but our flat was delayed, we informed him and he made the arrangements. Staffs was all super friendly, when i entered the room i was so impressed by the size and the feel of it. The honeymoon deco was nice too, so romantic and the bed oh my, it was so comfortable that i will fall asleep so easily on it. There is a nice private pool too. I also had a massage there, very reasonable price and i enjoyed every minute. I have no complaint whatsoever, would really recommend this place, very convenient to go from places to places the villa can help you with booking a taxi or if you want to rent a scooter. All in all a beautiful place that many beautiful memories were created at.
review 3:
Very recommended... Great place to stay in Jimbaran, near to lots of beaches like Jimbaran, Padang Padang, Melasti.

Really worth the price for a villa with private pool ü•∞ Large bedroom, large living room and medium pool. Romantic ambience for couple
review 4: Great place to stay.. family minded and staffs are great!! Its only consist of 4 villas.. quiet and private.. big lounge and clean pool.. very enjoyable stays.. recommended
review 5: Great room with privacy. It has big bedroom, dressing room, shower, kitchenette, and small pool (can't swim there). Breakfast is a letdown, hope they improve it or add more options to it.

name: JET BIKE & SKATE PARK
address: 6542+WCW, Jl. Karang Mas, Jimbaran, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1: Perfect to evacuate kid's energy in a good way. Spacious, clean, staff are friendly and helpful, nice park and parents can chill with cold beer. Recommended.
review 2: Nice place for kids and adult
review 3: Rather small skate area, good for small kids and beginners. The biking area was bigger and decent size. Staff was super friendly and polite. Food was okay. Kids loved the place overall.
review 4: i went here to day conting on that there was going to good jumps but after a hour in the car i was disapointed in how little the jumps where maintaing if you want come for mountain biking dont come here
review 5: I took my son there, the staff and guests are so friendly, it makes us happy.  The place is very clean and family friendly.

name: Nayla Boutique Villas Jimbaran
address: Jl. Karang Mas, Jimbaran, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1: Lovely villa, very spacious and clean. Very private and beautiful private pool. We had one bedroom and two complete bathrooms and even an outside shower. Staff is very friendly and will help you with everything you need, just ask. You will feel completely relaxed when you step foot in here. There are great restaurants nearby, which are easily reached by motorcycle or taxi. Also a supermarket across the street. Breakfast is served at your villa. Would definitely recommend this villa to completely relax.
review 2:
The first impressions of the villa, unfortunately, did not materialize.
Of the pluses, only that the villa is really spacious, beautifully designed and well located (supermarket and a pharmacy in front).
Minuses: knowledge of English at staff is very poor. In the presence of daily cleaning, its quality is poor.
Constantly turned off the electricity. For a month stay 7 or 8 times. Woke up at night in terrible stuffy, air conditioning did not work. Security level is 0 (CCTV cameras do not work, in our villa most of the time the door lock was faulty, the safe in the bedroom did not work).
!Theft!
We were robbed at night when we and our baby were sleeping!! It was not possible to find out who did this, either by the police or the hostess of the villa. Probably, the scheme is established and we are not the first.
Sincerely do not recommend staying here.
*
*
*

review 3: It's a million dollar property with a 25 dollar manager. People were friendly but with little English. Would be really nice if the towels and place were cleaned. Had quite a bad mildew smell. On the bright side, private pool, air conditioning totally brilliant pool venue for family or group. Just be prepared to clean up a bit.
review 4: Locations is bad - you will need to a ride a moped everywhere. Staff doenst speak english, you ask for one breakfast - get something else, also really huge disappointment.  Some villas are close right to the road. In the evening frogs come inside the villa as windows dont close properly and leave gaps big enough for the lizards to come in.  Villa itself is huge, comfortbale bed, good mosquito net. Can rent a scooter from the reception.
review 5: Is a very nice and clean place, cctv is every where, good design and so peaceful, clean air

name: Kost 001
address: 6532+39W, Jl. Jepun 1, Jimbaran, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

name: RedDoorz near Tegal Wangi Beach Jimbaran
address: Jl. Jepun No.7, Jimbaran, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1: Small place in a hidden area. Far from everything  so many mosquitoes in the room couldn't sleep. The toilet is not cleaned properly. The shower is not scrubbed properly too. Am so particular about hygiene
review 2: great place. kind owner..YOU HAVE TO STAY IN THIS PLACE. I GUARANTEE

name: OYO 90711 Blembong Homestay
address: 80361, Jimbaran, Kuta Selatan, Bali, 0361, Jimbaran, Kec. Kuta Sel., Bali, 80361, Indonesia
review 1:
No towels. No hot water. No drinking water, no toilet paper (upon request).

I moved in at 11 PM, straight from the airport, with baggage and all, I was exhausted after a long flight. At 12 AM (!!!) the owner‚Äôs sons knocked on my door and asked for payment.

FYI: all other places I stayed in Bali earlier only asked for the payment in the end of stay.

Even though I planned to stay longer, I only paid for 1 night and next morning I moved out.

Will never recommend this place to anyone. And not because of all the inconveniences I mentioned, but because of the attitude.
review 2: I recently stayed at the OYO Blembong hotel and I must say I was thoroughly impressed. The staff were friendly, accommodating and helpful. The rooms were spacious, clean and comfortable, and the amenities were top-notch. The location was also great. All in all, I had a great experience at OYO Blembong and I would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a great hotel experience for a good price.
review 3: This is a fantastic place for short or long term stays. The rooms are clean with nice cold air conditioning, hot water shower and a kitchen where you can cook and prepair meals (must supply your own stove and kitchen equipment including fridge).  I rate this place as the best home stay in Jimbaran when you are looking for value for money.
review 4: This place is new and doesn‚Äôt have many reviews but I had a very good stay. It‚Äôs all exactly as the photos on booking. It‚Äôs big, clean, the wifi and AC are working perfectly. You are 15 minutes far from Balangan beach and about 20-25 minutes from Uluwatu. The neighborhood is more authentic than Uluwatu, hence you also don‚Äôt have fancy hipster cafes but some warung and small local shops. However with a scooter you are close to everything. I didn‚Äôt have much contact with the owners as I stayed only one night but the few I had, I found them very nice. It‚Äôs one of the best value for money place I had in Indonesia.
review 5: Great place, clean and tidy. And located on great location, close to restaurant, minimarket and near by activity. also take a few minute to Jimbaran beach.

name: Oma Joglo Jimbaran
address: Jl. Karang Mas, Jimbaran, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1: Enjoy staying at Oma Joglo Jimbaran, very authentic with wood decoration and fit for long stay plan. The pool is right in front of our door, feels like home..
review 2: Oma Joglo Jimbaran is probably the most comfiest accomodation in Bali. The rooms are clean, room facilities are complete and the services are top notch, as well. It's also very relaxing to just chill in the pool. Thanks Oma Joglo, will come back soon!
review 3: We had an absolutely amazing time at oma joglo jimbaran. The rooms were spacious and apotless, with great decor and crips bed sheets. The staff were attentive and went out of their way to ensure that we were comportable.
review 4: Great view, clean room, peacefull. Recommended!

name: Kedai goeska
address: Jl. Karang Mas No.89, Jimbaran, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1: Good food & very affordable!! Cozy place
review 2: The fried rice was incredibly good and cheap! Rp 45k for food and beer..
review 3: Clean place, good food, cheap prices and nice staff and owner. Would recommend 100%!
review 4: Very very good. Amazing prices for amazing food üòä

name: Karangmas Guest House Jimbaran
address: Jl. Karang Mas Sejahtera No.28, Jimbaran, Kec. Kuta Sel., Bali, 80361, Indonesia

name: Hijau Gading Kost
address: Jl. Hijau Gading, Jimbaran, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

name: Warung Echo
address: 6552+6X2, Jl. Karang Mas, Jimbaran, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1: I appreciate the local atmosphere. As someone from Nepal who frequents similar quaint spots back home, being here felt like a piece of home. The authentic Balinese cuisine only added to the delightful experience.
review 2: Food is great! We stayed at Royal Tulip and walked out on both nights for dinner. The nasi goreng is really tasty. We like the ikan bakar and ayam bakar too. Eating there would be the best but the flies were annoying
review 3: Great food! We stayed right next to this warung and we ate here 4-5 times. The food was always delicious! When you see locals eating in a restaurant, you know the food is really good.
review 4: Good local warung. Open kitchen where possible to see the people preparing the food. Except for the fish all fresh ingredients. Some a bit too specific spiced for me. In places like this I would suggest to go for the classics and not try to experiment too much :-). Friendly and helpful staff. Prices unfortunately not written on the menu

name: rimawan kos
address: Sejahtera, Jl. Karang Mas gg. karangsari No.55, Jimbaran, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

name: Blembong Kost 2
address: Jl. Jepun Gg. Manikan No.2, Jimbaran, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1:
Thanks for the host, i live in best place in jimbaran area dor a couple of month.

Strong wifi connection, fresh water and suspicious bed area.

name: kedai joglo jimbaran
